speaker: Lena
text: If we give consistent feedback, the junior devs will improve a lot faster.
ipa: ɪf wi ɡɪv kənˈsɪstənt ˈfiːdbæk | ðə ˈʤuːniɚ dɛvz wɪl ɪmˈpruv ə lɑt ˈfæstɚ
stress: IF we GIVE CONSISTENT FEEDBACK | the JUNIOR DEVS will IMPROVE a LOT FASTER
linking:
"give consistent" → /ɡɪv kənˈsɪstənt/ (v + k linking)
"will improve" → /wɪl ɪmˈpruv/ (l + i linking)

speaker: Jared
text: Exactly. And if we wait until the end of the quarter, they won’t have time to apply it.
ipa: ɪɡˈzæktli | ənd ɪf wi weɪt ənˈtɪl ði ɛnd əv ðə ˈkwɔɹtɚ | ðeɪ woʊnt hæv taɪm tu əˈplaɪ ɪt
stress: EXACTLY | AND IF we WAIT UNTIL the END of the QUARTER | they WON’T HAVE TIME to APPLY IT
linking:
"wait until" → /weɪt ənˈtɪl/ (t + u linking)
"have time" → /hæv taɪm/ (v + t linking)

speaker: Lena
text: True. If they see their progress week by week, they will feel more motivated.
ipa: tru | ɪf ðeɪ si ðɛɹ ˈpɹɑɡɹɛs wik baɪ wik | ðeɪ wɪl fil mɔɹ ˈmoʊtɪˌveɪtɪd
stress: TRUE | IF they SEE their PROGRESS WEEK by WEEK | they WILL FEEL MORE MOTIVATED
linking:
"see their" → /si ðɛɹ/ (i + th linking)
"feel more" → /fil mɔɹ/ (l + m linking)

speaker: Jared
text: Right. If we focus on communication and code quality, the rest will follow naturally.
ipa: ɹaɪt | ɪf wi ˈfoʊkəs ɑn kəˌmjunəˈkeɪʃən ənd koʊd ˈkwɑləti | ðə ɹɛst wɪl ˈfɑloʊ ˈnætʃɚəli
stress: RIGHT | IF we FOCUS on COMMUNICATION and CODE QUALITY | the REST will FOLLOW NATURALLY
linking:
"focus on" → /ˈfoʊkəs ɑn/ (s + o linking)
"code quality" → /koʊd ˈkwɑləti/ (d + q linking)

speaker: Lena
text: And if someone asks for mentorship, we should offer time and guidance.
ipa: ænd ɪf ˈsʌmwʌn æsks fɔɹ ˈmɛntɔɹʃɪp | wi ʃʊd ˈɔfɚ taɪm ənd ˈɡaɪdəns
stress: AND IF SOMEONE ASKS for MENTORSHIP | we SHOULD OFFER TIME and GUIDANCE
linking:
"asks for" → /æsks fɔɹ/ (s + f linking)
"offer time" → /ˈɔfɚ taɪm/ (r + t linking)

speaker: Jared
text: Totally agree. But if they don’t take the feedback seriously, nothing will change.
ipa: ˈtoʊtəli əˈɡɹi | bʌt ɪf ðeɪ doʊnt teɪk ðə ˈfiːdbæk ˈsɪɹiəsli | ˈnʌθɪŋ wɪl ʧeɪndʒ
stress: TOTALLY AGREE | BUT IF they DON’T TAKE the FEEDBACK SERIOUSLY | NOTHING will CHANGE
linking:
"don’t take" → /doʊnt teɪk/ (t + t linking)
"will change" → /wɪl ʧeɪndʒ/ (l + ch linking)

speaker: Lena
text: That’s where we step in. If we create a supportive environment, even struggling devs will grow quickly.
ipa: ðæts wɛɹ wi stɛp ɪn | ɪf wi kɹiˈeɪt ə səˈpɔɹtɪv ɪnˈvaɪɹənmənt | ˈivən ˈstɹʌɡəlɪŋ dɛvz wɪl ɡɹoʊ ˈkwɪkli
stress: THAT’S WHERE we STEP IN | IF we CREATE a SUPPORTIVE ENVIRONMENT | EVEN STRUGGLING DEVS will GROW QUICKLY
linking:
"step in" → /stɛp ɪn/ (p + i linking)
"grow quickly" → /ɡɹoʊ ˈkwɪkli/ (w + q linking)

speaker: Jared
text: Exactly. And if they feel safe to ask questions, they won’t be afraid to take initiative.
ipa: ɪɡˈzæktli | ənd ɪf ðeɪ fil seɪf tu æsk ˈkwɛsʧənz | ðeɪ woʊnt bi əˈfɹeɪd tu teɪk ɪˈnɪʃətɪv
stress: EXACTLY | AND IF they FEEL SAFE to ASK QUESTIONS | they WON’T BE AFRAID to TAKE INITIATIVE
linking:
"feel safe" → /fil seɪf/ (l + s linking)
"take initiative" → /teɪk ɪˈnɪʃətɪv/ (k + i linking)

speaker: Lena
text: That’s the goal. If we get this right, the whole team will level up.
ipa: ðæts ðə ɡoʊl | ɪf wi ɡɛt ðɪs ɹaɪt | ðə hoʊl tim wɪl ˈlɛvəl ʌp
stress: THAT’S the GOAL | IF we GET THIS RIGHT | the WHOLE TEAM will LEVEL UP
linking:
"get this" → /ɡɛt ðɪs/ (t + th linking)
"level up" → /ˈlɛvəl ʌp/ (l + u linking)
